mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_survey_user( survey_user_id, survey_user_name, survey_user_sex, survey_user_birthdate, phone_number, second_user_name, detail_address, organization_id, remarks, user_id, province_code, city_code, county_code, create_time )VALUES ( #{surveyUserId}, #{surveyUserName}, #{surveyUserSex}, #{surveyUserBirthdate}, #{phoneNumber}, #{secondUserName}, #{detailAddress}, #{organizationId}, #{remarks}, #{userId}, #{provinceCode}, #{cityCode}, #{countyCode}, NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_survey_user set phone_number = #{phoneNumber}, second_user_name = #{secondUserName}, province_code = #{provinceCode}, city_code = #{cityCode}, county_code = #{countyCode}, detail_address = #{detailAddress} where survey_user_id = #{surveyUserId}
mapper.select: select organization_id as organizationId, organization_name as organizationName, organization_desc as organizationDesc, organization_phone as organizationPhone, organization_address as organizationAddress, DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') as createTime, DATE_FORMAT(deadline_time, '%Y-%m-%d') as deadlineTime from t_organization where organization_id = #{organizationId}
select image_id as imageId, image_url as imageUrl, sort from t_organization_image where organization_id = #{organizationId};

SELECT user_id as appUserId, user_name as userName -- sex, -- age, -- phone_number as phoneNumber, -- password, -- parent_id as parentId, -- organization_name as organizationName, -- user_type as userType, -- user_source as userSource, -- user_status as userStatus from t_app_user where organization_id = #{organizationId}

select user_id as appUserId, survey_user_name as surveyUserName, second_user_name as secondUserName, province_code as provinceCode, city_code as cityCode, county_code as countyCode, survey_user_sex as surveyUserSex, DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') as createTime, survey_user_birthdate as surveyUserBirthdate, detail_address as detailAddress from t_survey_user where survey_user_id = #{surveyUserId}

SELECT survey_user_id as surveyUserId, survey_user_name as surveyUserName, survey_user_sex as surveyUserSex, DATE_FORMAT(survey_user_birthdate, '%Y-%m-%d') as surveyUserBirthdate, phone_number as phoneNumber, second_user_name as scondUserName, province_code as provinceCode, city_code as cityCode, county_code as countyCode, detail_address as detailAddress FROM `t_survey_user` WHERE user_id = #{appUserId}
